error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'kingfisher_more_than_pelican' (value: 7) was used instead of 'total_pelican_kingfisher_fish' (value: 33).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 8
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=33>>33 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 7 = <<3*7=21>>21 fish
The fisherman caught 21 - 13 = <<21-13=8>>8 more fish than the pelican.
